name: Participatory Agroforestry deveLopment: a tool for restoring and sUstaining the Palù del Quartier del Piave site
description: The main objective of the LIFE PALU QdP project is to conserve characteristic habitats and species of the ‘Palù del Quartier del Piave’ Natura 2000 network site in the Veneto region of Italy, by reintroducing sustainable agroforestry and traditional meadow management practices.
